title: What is the difference between Guyenne, Gascony, and Aquitaine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Originally, all three were regions (sometime kingdoms) in the south west of modern France. Their heyday was roughly a thousand years ago “when knights were bold”, etc. If your interest goes beyond a simple question, I’d be surprised if there were not histories you could consult and, quite possibly, some novels set in that time and place, which would no doubt give a better feel for the subject. Good luck with your quest. Sorry to have taken so long to reply. (I’d be interested to hear how you get on - it sounds fascinating.)
